mapper.select: SELECT dst.id, dst.domain_id, dst.relation_id FROM domain_to_relation dst, ( SELECT id, domain_id, relation_id FROM domain_to_relation WHERE domain_id = #{id} ) src WHERE dst.relation_id = src.relation_id AND dst.id <> src.id
mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE domain_to_relation ( id VARCHAR, domain_id BIGINT, relation_id VARCHAR )
